SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

org.opends.sdk
Interface ConnectionFuture<C extends AsynchronousConnection>

Type Parameters:
C - The type of asynchronous connection returned by this connection future.
All Superinterfaces:
Future<C>
public interface ConnectionFuture<C extends AsynchronousConnection>
extends Future<C>

A handle which can be used to retrieve a requested AsynchronousConnection.

TODO: Do we want to throw an ErrorResultException? I think we do because exceptions are not limited to connection related errors. For example, a transacted connection would already have a physical connection; an error could occur when sending the start txn extended op.

Method Summary
 boolean cancel(boolean mayInterruptIfRunning)
          Attempts to cancel the request.
 C get()
          Waits if necessary for the connection request to complete, and then returns the asynchronous connection if the connection request succeeded.
 C get(long timeout, TimeUnit unit)
          Waits if necessary for at most the given time for the connection request to complete, and then returns the asynchronous connection if the connection request succeeded.
 boolean isCancelled()
          Returns true if the connection request was cancelled before it completed normally.
 boolean isDone()
          Returns true if the connection request has completed.
 

Method Detail

cancel

boolean cancel(boolean mayInterruptIfRunning)
Attempts to cancel the request. This attempt will fail if the request has already completed or has already been cancelled. If successful, then cancellation results in an abandon or cancel request (if configured) being sent to the server.

After this method returns, subsequent calls to isDone() will always return true. Subsequent calls to isCancelled() will always return true if this method returned true.

Specified by:
cancel in interface Future<C extends AsynchronousConnection>
Parameters:
mayInterruptIfRunning - true if the thread executing executing the response handler should be interrupted; otherwise, in-progress response handlers are allowed to complete.
Returns:
false if the request could not be cancelled, typically because it has already completed normally; true otherwise.

get

C get()
                                     throws InterruptedException,
                                            ErrorResultException
Waits if necessary for the connection request to complete, and then returns the asynchronous connection if the connection request succeeded. If the connection request failed (i.e. a non-successful result code was obtained) then a ErrorResultException is thrown.

Specified by:
get in interface Future<C extends AsynchronousConnection>
Returns:
The asynchronous connection, but only if the the connection request succeeded.
Throws:
CancellationException - If the connection request was cancelled using a call to cancel(boolean).
ErrorResultException - If the connection request failed for some reason.
InterruptedException - If the current thread was interrupted while waiting.

get

C get(long timeout,
      TimeUnit unit)
                                     throws InterruptedException,
                                            TimeoutException,
                                            ErrorResultException
Waits if necessary for at most the given time for the connection request to complete, and then returns the asynchronous connection if the connection request succeeded. If the connection request failed (i.e. a non-successful result code was obtained) then a ErrorResultException is thrown.

Specified by:
get in interface Future<C extends AsynchronousConnection>
Parameters:
timeout - The maximum time to wait.
unit - The time unit of the timeout argument.
Returns:
The asynchronous connection, but only if the the connection request succeeded.
Throws:
CancellationException - If the connection request was cancelled using a call to cancel(boolean).
ErrorResultException - If the connection request failed for some reason.
InterruptedException - If the current thread was interrupted while waiting.
TimeoutException - If the wait timed out.

isCancelled

boolean isCancelled()
Returns true if the connection request was cancelled before it completed normally.

Specified by:
isCancelled in interface Future<C extends AsynchronousConnection>
Returns:
true if the connection request was cancelled before it completed normally, otherwise false.

isDone

boolean isDone()
Returns true if the connection request has completed.

Completion may be due to normal termination, an exception, or cancellation. In all of these cases, this method will return true.

Specified by:
isDone in interface Future<C extends AsynchronousConnection>
Returns:
true if the connection request has completed, otherwise false.
